name: Pack Legacy Challenge Dashboard
description: This Notion template is for all of you out there who want to track their progress in the Pack Legacy Challenge. It comes with a main dashboard (including a progress tracker) and an overview of all the generations. Each generation comes with it's own little dashboard so you can add information about the heir of that generation. This template contains all the rules, generational backstories and information you need to play this challenge making it your one stop shop for the Pack Legacy! *The templ
